articles.author: Margherita Bassi
articles.title: Ice Age Kids Sported Cheek Piercings, 29,000-Year-Old Teeth Suggest - Gizmodo
articles.description: Strange wear marks on the teeth of Paleolithic people in Central Europe have long puzzled scientists, but new research may finally reveal the cause.
articles.content: Numerous human remains discovered in central Europe dating to the last Ice Age have unusual abrasions on their teeth that have stumped experts for decades. Now, a researcher in Portugal has put forth… [+2951 chars]
